description:
A graphical and themeable emulator front-end that allows you to access all your favorite games in one place, even without a keyboard.

[FAQ](http://emulationstation.org/faq.html)
[Forum](http://emulationstation.org/forum/index.php)
[Source code](https://github.com/Aloshi/EmulationStation)
summary: Cross-platform graphical front-end for emulators with controller navigation
author: Alec Lofquist
